content:
A vegan snack business wants to promote their eco-friendly values through catchy taglines. Using only mathematical equations and symbols, create three taglines that incorporate sustainability and promote their products.
1. Vegan snacks + sustainable packaging = a greener tomorrow
2. Eco-friendly snacking = guilt-free indulgence 
3. Health + sustainability = vegan snacks for a better world

Creating taglines using mathematical symbols and equations is a creative way to highlight the eco-friendly values of a vegan snack business. Here are three such taglines:

1. 🌱(Vegan Snacks) + ♻️(Sustainable Packaging) = 🌍(A Greener Tomorrow)

2. 📦(Eco-friendly) + 🥗(Snacking) = 😊(Guilt-free Indulgence)

3. ❤️(Health) + 🌿(Sustainability) = 🌱(Vegan Snacks) ➡️ 🌏(A Better World)
